properties.name: tokenPrefix
properties.description: Type of authentication.

properties.name: authHeader
properties.description: Header name used for authorization.

properties.name: signUpUrl
properties.description: Url of an endpoint for users to sign up.

properties.name: tokenSecret
properties.description: Private code used to build tokens.

properties.name: minUsernameLen
properties.description: Users with username shorter than this are not allowed.

properties.name: maxUsernameLen
properties.description: Users with username longer than this are not allowed.

properties.name: recordsPerPage
properties.description: Defines parameter for user content pagination.

properties.name: evaluatorsPerBlock
properties.description: Defines number of evaluators loaded in one block (when user wants to know who liked a specified record..

properties.name: commentsPerBlock
properties.description: How name comments are displayed in a block.

properties.name: followersPerBlock
properties.description: How many followers are loaded at a time.

properties.name: digestPageSize
properties.description: The number of the most recent records displayed as a digest.

properties.name: searchPageSize
properties.description: The number of records or publishers returned on client's query.

properties.name: recordsPreviewBlock
properties.description: Number of record images returned when publisher preview data gets queried.

properties.name: passwordPattern.regexp
properties.description: Pattern that defines acceptable passwords for user registration.

properties.name: recordRecommendationSize
properties.description: Number of recommended records offered to a client (customer/user).

properties.name: publisherRecommendationSize
properties.description: Number of recommended publishers.

properties.name: recordsDirectoriesDepth
properties.description: Number of directory levels for storing record images.

properties.name: compressionThreshold
properties.description: If image that is being stored is bigger that this, then a compressed copy of this image is created.

properties.name: signupExpiration
properties.description: Time a user has to confirm his registration.

properties.name: confirmSignUpUrl
properties.description: Url to be used as a base to confirm registration request.
